short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage all your online learning with One-Trail. Set your learning goals, get weekly reports, and visualize your learning journey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
Manage all your online learning in one place. Set your learning goals, get weekly reports on your learning goals, and visualize your learning journey.

One-Trail collects data automatically from online learning platforms you visit on the internet. Data such as the micro-skills you gain while learning from any learning content, the source of that content, and a reference to it. All of these are saved on a dashboard you can easily access.

Learning content such as Videos, courses, webinars, podcasts, and articles can be saved on your dashboard and there are filters that help you easily find a learning resource you need.

How it works
There are three ways One-Trail saves your learning:
Automatically; In this case, the resource you are using is automatically saved quietly in the background as you learn.
A One trail pop-up shows on your screen. Follow the prompt to add the resource to your One Trail
You can click the extension icon at the top right of the screen and follow the prompt to add the resource to your One Trail.

Feel your learning
In an internet of overwhelming learning content, One-Trail is like a compass through the mess. There’s so much we learn while using the internet, but never track. One-Trail hands you the power to 

What’s included
The current full version of One-Trail has no paid feature.
Manage all your online learning
Create wish lists of what you intend to learn
Track your performance and learning goals
Get Email/ reports of your weekly learning.

Works well with the top content platforms
One-Trail is customized to work seamlessly with sites that have learning content.
